Tuesday September 6th 2011

Kuralt recalled as ‘American Hero’

By Jonathan Michels

 
Lois Cranford gives tours of the Charles Kuralt Learning Center at UNC.

Charles Kuralt was in the news business. But mainly he was in the people business. Kuralt reported for CBS for 36 years. He traveled across the country for his “On the Road” series to meet the kind of people you could only meet by chance.

Reporter Jonathan Michels visits the Charles Kuralt Learning Center on the UNC campus, which pays tribute to one of Carolina’s best-known alums.
